alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Custer, western Oglala Lakota and northeastern Fall River Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 159 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buffalo Corrals, or 15 miles northeast of Hot Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Southern Black Hills
